casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Lawrence J. Brunoli (13610) (13611)

Lavery, Heiman and Hennessy, Js.

Argued Janury 10 decision released February 7, 1995 Zbigniew S. Rozbicki, for the appellant (defendant). Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Frank S. Maco, state’s attorney, and James Fletcher, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
